Name: illumizzle: Finding the lost light
About the game: 'Will we live in a dark world for the rest of your life?' illumizzle: Finding the lost light is a single-player puzzle adventure game. The main characters, Raco and Vera, live in a village in a virtual world where there is no natural light. Players take on the roles of the main characters on an adventure to repair their broken sun. However, various puzzles stand in their way. Solve the puzzles and help them recover the lost light! Features Different types of 3D puzzles for each map Cute illustrations and fairy tale-like stories Steam achievements that arouses the desire to challenge
